title: Spring ball [Widescreen]
brief_description: At the Annual Senior Citizens Spring Ball another woman is named Spring Belle. Over the course of the evening, memories of friends lost as well as the lives that they’ve led will be shared. A powerful short film shot in Wagga about ageing with dignity and the era of Spring Dances and all they encompass. (Awards: Voted most popular Australian Short Film, Sydney Film Festival, 1993)
